title: Careers in Alternative Medicine (Paperback)
author: Alan Steinfeld
cleaned_text: You are here [Back to top](#skip-link) Careers in Alternative Medicine (Paperback) $35.60 Usually Ships in 1-5 Days Description There are many potential and exciting jobs waiting to be filled by people with the necessary skills and determination. These titles will shape young people's interests in occupations, ranging from from trucking to starting and building franchises. Today many people are taking an active part in staying healthy, which may include seeking alternatives to conventional medicine. This volume presents the philosophy behind holistic medicine, examines various therapies, and suggests how to become involved in this increasingly popular field.
